name: AD Computer, Group and Recursive User Membership to Local SQLite DB
author: Stuart Morgan <stuart.morgan@mwrinfosecurity.com>
description:
This module will gather a list of AD groups, identify the users (taking into account recursion)
        and write this to a SQLite database for offline analysis and query using normal SQL syntax.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: GROUP_FILTER
options.description: Additional LDAP filters to use when searching for initial groups

options.name: SHOW_USERGROUPS
options.description: Show the user/group membership in a greppable form to the console.

options.name: SHOW_COMPUTERS
options.description: Show basic computer information in a greppable form to the console.

options.name: THREADS
options.description: Number of threads to spawn to gather membership of each group.
